pages.text: You can do wall-running horizontally. But if wall is slippery, you cannot do this.$(br)Sometimes misunderstood, but the technique of $(italic)Wall Run$() is vertical one, not horizontal.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Do $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$() in air along the wall$(br)$(bold)2.$() Continue to press Wall-Run Key($(k:parcool.HorizontalWallRun))
